participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and lively, loves social gatherings but has a sensitive side due to her fear of heights.
participant_1.background: I'm a party animal. I help out at the food bank occasionally. I am deathly afraid of heights. My favorite movie is Mean Girls. I own a cat and a dog.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Friendly and nurturing, enjoys teaching and sharing knowledge with others, and has a competitive spirit when it comes to board games.
participant_2.background: My favorite band is Up and I got to see them in concert once. I am an elementary school teacher. My parents were also teachers. I love to play board games.
